label: Request Finance
name: requestFinance
description: Issue invoices and accept payments in cryptocurrency using RequestFinance API

options.label: Get Invoice
options.name: getSingleInvoice
options.description: Returns single invoice from RequestFinance account.

options.label: Create Salary Payment
options.name: createSalaryPayment
options.description: Creates a new payable salary payment.

inputParameters.label: Salary Currency
inputParameters.name: salaryCurrency
inputParameters.description: Currency in which the salary will be issued in.

inputParameters.label: Salary Amount
inputParameters.name: salaryAmount
inputParameters.description: Amount of salary to be paid

inputParameters.label: How do you want to pay?
inputParameters.name: salaryPaymentCurrency
inputParameters.description: Currency in which the employer would like to pay in.

inputParameters.label: Employee Email
inputParameters.name: employeeEmail
inputParameters.description: Email of the employee

inputParameters.label: Employee Wallet Address
inputParameters.name: employeePaymentAddress
inputParameters.description: Wallet address of the employee to receive salary

inputParameters.label: Owner Email
inputParameters.name: companyEmail
inputParameters.description: Email of the owner that issues salary payment. Refer to Account page

inputParameters.label: Owner First Name
inputParameters.name: companyFirstName
inputParameters.description: First name of the owner that issues salary payment. Refer to Account page

inputParameters.label: Company Last Name
inputParameters.name: companyLastName
inputParameters.description: Last name of the owner that issues salary payment. Refer to Account page

inputParameters.label: Company Business Name
inputParameters.name: companyBusinessName
inputParameters.description: Business name of the company. Refer to Account page

inputParameters.label: Company Address Line 1
inputParameters.name: companyStreetAddress
inputParameters.description: Street, house, apartment of the company.

inputParameters.label: Company Address Line 2
inputParameters.name: companyExtendedAddress
inputParameters.description: Street, house, apartment of the company.

inputParameters.label: Company Postal Code
inputParameters.name: companyPostalCode
inputParameters.description: Post code of the company.

inputParameters.label: Company State
inputParameters.name: companyRegion
inputParameters.description: Region of the company (e.g. “California”).

inputParameters.label: Company Country
inputParameters.name: companyCountry
inputParameters.description: Country of the company (e.g. US).

inputParameters.label: Invoice Currency
inputParameters.name: invoiceCurrency
inputParameters.description: Currency in which the invoice is denominated. For example, invoices can be denominated in USD, but buyers can pay in crypto.

array.label: Name
array.name: name
array.description: Name of the product/service for which the invoice is created.

array.label: Unit Price
array.name: unitPrice
array.description: Price of the product/service, excl. taxes. Max 2 decimal places

array.label: Quantity
array.name: quantity
array.description: Quantity of the product/service that was provided.

array.label: Tax Type
array.name: taxType
array.description: Currency code in which the invoice is denominated. For example, invoices can be denominated in USD, but buyers can pay in crypto.

inputParameters.label: Payment Address
inputParameters.name: paymentAddress
inputParameters.description: Address which will receive the payment.

inputParameters.label: Payment Currency
inputParameters.name: paymentCurrency
inputParameters.description: Currency in which the invoice can be paid.

inputParameters.label: Payment Due Date
inputParameters.name: paymentDueDate
inputParameters.description: Due date of the invoice. Last date the buyer can pay.

inputParameters.label: Client Email
inputParameters.name: buyerInfoEmail
inputParameters.description: Email of the buyer/customer/client

inputParameters.label: Client Business Name
inputParameters.name: buyerInfoBusinessName
inputParameters.description: Business name of the buyer/customer/client

inputParameters.label: Client Address Line 1
inputParameters.name: buyerInfoStreetAddress
inputParameters.description: Street, house, apartment of the buyer.

inputParameters.label: Client Address Line 2
inputParameters.name: buyerInfoExtendedAddress
inputParameters.description: Street, house, apartment of the buyer.

inputParameters.label: Client Postal Code
inputParameters.name: buyerInfoPostalCode
inputParameters.description: Post code of the buyer.

inputParameters.label: Client State
inputParameters.name: buyerInfoRegion
inputParameters.description: Region of the buyer (e.g. “California”).

inputParameters.label: Client Country
inputParameters.name: buyerInfoCountry
inputParameters.description: Country of the buyer (e.g. US).

inputParameters.label: Client Tax Registration
inputParameters.name: buyerInfoTaxRegistration
inputParameters.description: Tax registration number of the buyer.
